flawed_nl_solution:
If Ron is 43 now, he will be 43+5 = <<43+5=44>>44 years old in five years.
After five years, Ron will be four times as old as Maurice, meaning Maurice will be 44/4 =<<44/4=11>>11 years old then.
Currently, Maurice is 11-5 = <<11-5=6>>6 years old.
